web_snippets: A Guatemalan-Anglo American, Rebecca Balcárcel is the award-winning author of SHINE ON, LUZ VÉLIZ! and THE OTHER HALF OF HAPPY.
A community college English teacher and regular presenter, Rebecca Balcárcel leads adventures for grade-schoolers through adults.
